trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, confira <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Aplicativos Móveis & Sites com ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> object is automatically created and passed to the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> objeto é automaticamente criado e passado para o manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.

trans-unit.source: An inherited class or event handler can use this event to show commands unique to the item, by changing the collection of commands in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos ou classe herdado pode usar esse evento para mostrar os comandos exclusivo para o item, alterando o conjunto de comandos no <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For a code sample, see the example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte o exemplo para o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> visão geral.

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: para operação em um ambiente hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, confira <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Aplicativos Móveis & Sites com ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> object, initializing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> properties with the values of the `item` and `commands` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Constrói um novo <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> do objeto, inicializando o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> propriedades com valores da `item` e `commands` parâmetros, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of commands in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de comandos nos objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, a coleção está vazia.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, confira <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Aplicativos Móveis & Sites com ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The collection of commands in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de comandos de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove commands in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar ou remover comandos na coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A> métodos de <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to access and modify the commands for a single item in an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object during the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para acessar e modificar os comandos de um único item em uma <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> objeto durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Changes made do not affect the base collection of commands specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object.
trans-unit.target: As alterações feitas não afetam a coleção de base de comandos especificado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o item de lista para os comandos especificados que serão exibidos.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, confira <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Aplicativos Móveis & Sites com ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: O item de lista para os comandos especificados serão exibidos.
